lines.text: Overman was killed inside the park. The baby was caught inside the park. Its mother is inside the park.
Our shark couldn't have killed Overman. Its mother did.
You're talkin' about some damn shark's mother?
White sharks are dangerous. I know 'em. My father, my brother, myself. They're murders.
He needs eyes in the back of his head, Calvin.
Then perhaps we can have a drink and some dinner tonight?
Oh, I'm sorry, Mr. FitzRoyce, but that's a behavior I just don't do.
I see my brother nailed you, eh?
Your brother?
Yeah, believe it or not.
If he wouldn't have pulled that old crotch trick, he never would have won.
Yeah. That's his best move.
It runs in the family.
I was this close doing it in the water last night, and that's a first.
This close, huh?
Was it the shark?
It was a shark. It was a shark with a bite radius about a yard across.
Don't be silly. That would indicate a shark of some 35 feet in length.
I don't believe it. She got him in the water.
Never underestimate the power, huh?
He don't sleep in; he don't live in. You tell Shelby Overman for me he can take a flyin' leap in a rollin' doughnut on a gravel driveway, you hear?
No grenades.
Here come my pride and joy.
What if she doesn't want to go back in?
Oh, I think we can pretty much guarantee that she'll want to go back in. Don't you, Jack?
Sure.
Well, just how are you going to guarantee that?
Live bait.
Overman was killed inside the park, the baby was caught inside the park, the mother is inside the park.

[trying to start the boat]
Damn boat. I flooded the damn boat.
We are having dinner here.
Why don't we blow it up?
Listen, nephew. There's a $2-1/2 million turbine that's not gonna go up in smoke because of some damn fish! Shut the pumps down!
But tell me, how do you contain the sharks in this part of the lagoon?
Well, you know, uh, it's that old shark screen, the bubble screen. You know, sharks don't like that. It's what they call, uh, marine segregation.
You put on weight, you need a shave, and you're too tall.
Well, uh, two of out of three I can fix, huh?
[last lines]
Sandy! All right! All right!
Daddy, look at the fish!
Holy shit!
